revision.comment: Central Nahuatl: correct whitespace of section 0
revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Tlaxcala}} {{l|nhn|xokok}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhn|/ʃokok/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|nhn|adjective}} # [[sour]] ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ʃokok/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|nci|adjective}} # [[sour]] #* '''1555''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana|Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana]]'', f. 30r. #*: Azeda coſa. '''xococ'''. ====Related terms==== * [[xocotl]] * [[xocoya]]
